page.title: 11 The Teachers' Centre
page.content: Mr. Smalley told us what we were going to do, he said you will be going to see a printing machine, the library, and the computer room. We all split into two groups, some of us were in Mr. Webb's group and some went into Mrs. Stroud's group. I was in Mrs. Stroud's group. First Mrs. Stroud's group went into the printing room. Mr. Pollard was the person who controld (sic) the printing machine. He copied a picture. Then we went into the library and there were two secretarys. We gathered round the secretarys' desks. They showed us how to work their electronic typewriters, after that I talked to Mr.Smalley on the telephone. We went to the library part. There were films the teachers' could borrow. Soon we went up to the computer room. ('sic' as received) St. Marks
